scripts.ng-m-4: node -e "const entityName = process.argv[1]; require('child_process').execSync('ng generate interface models/entities/' + entityName + '.model', { stdio: [0, 1, 2] }); require('child_process').execSync('ng generate interface models/DTOs/add-' + entityName + '-request.model', { stdio: [0, 1, 2] }); require('child_process').execSync('ng generate interface models/DTOs/update-' + entityName + '-request.model', { stdio: [0, 1, 2] });"
scripts.ng-auth-s-4: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('ng generate service services/Auth-Service/' + process.argv[1], { stdio: [0, 1, 2] });"
scripts.ng-crud-s-4: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('ng generate service services/CRUD-Services/' + process.argv[1], { stdio: [0, 1, 2] });"
scripts.ng-srd-s-4: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('ng generate service services/Shared-Services/' + process.argv[1], { stdio: [0, 1, 2] });"
scripts.ng-crud-c-4: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('ng generate component components/CRUDComponents/' + process.argv[1] + '-CRUD/' + process.argv[1] + '-add', { stdio: [0, 1, 2] }); require('child_process').execSync('ng generate component components/CRUDComponents/' + process.argv[1] + '-CRUD/' + process.argv[1] + '-details', { stdio: [0, 1, 2] }); require('child_process').execSync('ng generate component components/CRUDComponents/' + process.argv[1] + '-CRUD/' + process.argv[1] + '-edit', { stdio: [0, 1, 2] }); require('child_process').execSync('ng generate component components/CRUDComponents/' + process.argv[1] + '-CRUD/' + process.argv[1] + '-list', { stdio: [0, 1, 2] });"
scripts.ng-layout-c-4: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('ng generate component components/LayoutComponents/' + process.argv[1] + '-layout', { stdio: [0, 1, 2] });"
scripts.ng-auth-c-4: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('ng generate component components/AuthComponents/' + process.argv[1], { stdio: [0, 1, 2] });"
